description:
Sahlins Epstain was the head of the Epstain Family and a member of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order,] where he served the http://anidb.net/ch32500 [Asian Branch] as the head of the Science Council. He, along with his daughter http://anidb.net/ch84695 [Renny Epstain], served as the representative of the Epstain Family`s efforts in the Second Exorcist Project, where he offered both his scientific prowess and his skills in his family`s magic.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.
name: Sahlins Epstain
